name: Timberland Premium Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
description:
Fleece-lined, work-inspired winter boots. A waterproof upper of premium leather and ReBOTL™ fabric lets you walk right through slushy streets that force others to detour. Cozy fleece lining and toasty PrimaLoft™ insulation keep your feet warm on winter's coldest mornings, while the lugged rubber outsole lets you stride confidently along icy sidewalks and up slippery stairs.Uppers are made from waterproof leather and ReBOTL fabric.TimberDry™ waterproof breathable membrane lets your feet breath while keeping them dry, and it is made from 50% post-consumer recycled material.Fleecy faux fur liners are warm, wicking and made from ReBOTL fabric.PrimaLoft synthetic insulation is light and efficient.Supportive EVA midsole provides all day comfort.Aggressive tread helps keep you anchored.Uses Timberland’s ReBOTL material that contains at least 50% recycled plastic, mainly from plastic bottles. To date Timberland has helped more than 500 metric tons of plastic waste find new life in their products.Upper’s leather comes from a leather tannery rated Silver or higher by a third-party environmental audit. The Leather Working Group judges and classifies tanneries based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.

        Sustainability
